Description: 
------------- 
The paper is not eternal. Over the years, books, journals and reports deteriorate and disappear. Digital copy with a scanner can preserve the information contained indefinitely. ABBYY FineReader is an extremely advanced program for optical character recognition, definition that is narrow, since it also detects elements of layout, images, tables and even the language in which you are writing the paper. Compatible with all scanners, ABBYY FineReader is very easy to use. Scanned pages are accumulated in the left pane, while the right contains a preview of the digitized content and result of OCR. ABBYY FineReader performance is exceptional. The amount of mistakes is negligible, and any doubt is indicated by color in the final document to correct it immediately. At the end, ABBYY FineReader can export PDF copy search supports, DOC, XLS, or HTML. Whether you need to scan lots of documents as if they want to apply character recognition to a photograph taken with the phone, ABBYY FineReader is the most effective for this. 


ABBYY FineReader supports the following formats: 
DOC, DOCX, PDF, RTF, TXT, XLS, xslx, HTML, CSV
